title: Update regarding GeneSys
story_body:
GeneSys (GENE) has announced the appointment of Jane Doe as Vice President of Marketing, effective immediately. According to a statement released at 08:00 EST, Doe will oversee the company's global marketing strategy.

In a separate development, GeneSys has launched a new social media campaign, #GeneSysCares, aimed at promoting the company's commitment to environmental sustainability. The campaign, which went live at 09:00 EST, will feature a series of posts highlighting GeneSys's efforts to reduce its carbon footprint.

In its latest Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) update, GeneSys reported a 2% reduction in energy consumption at its headquarters in the second quarter of 2023, compared to the same period in 2022. The company attributed the decrease to the implementation of energy-efficient lighting and HVAC systems.

Additionally, GeneSys has announced the renewal of its membership with the Responsible Minerals Initiative (RMI), a non-profit organization dedicated to promoting responsible mineral sourcing practices. The renewal, effective July 1, 2023, demonstrates GeneSys's ongoing commitment to responsible business practices.

These updates were reported in a statement released by GeneSys at 10:00 EST, and are available on the company's website.
